title: Is there anyone know this font or similar font?
content:
Dear all,

I have been searching for this font which shows on the image attached (Loy Krathong) but I could not find it. Is there anyone this font or something similar? Thank you and thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023012908im_/http:/typophile.com/files/m1_4514.jpg)
author: MHume

comments.content: no exact matches (at this time) but you can search [Blackletter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023012908/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/blackletter/fonts/) fonts and find many similars. Such as [Fine Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023012908/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/finefonts/fine-gothic/) and [Cabazon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023012908/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/parkinson/cabazon/) among others.
Thank you very much for your help :o)
